Articles.Content: anyone know what the various scene codes mean in the Persistance file? I can't find a reference.

public enum GameScenes
{
    LOADING = 0,
    LOADINGBUFFER = 1,
    MAINMENU = 2,
    SETTINGS = 3,
    CREDITS = 4,
    SPACECENTER = 5,
    EDITOR = 6,
    FLIGHT = 7,
    TRACKSTATION = 8,
    PSYSTEM = 9,
}
